extendedInfo.description: *** If you find that the game is slow, you can improve performance from the option menu :)Do you will get to see the 5 scenarios?Zombies are hungry. You must escape from them. Run!. They are dying to eat your finger. If they touch you, your life will decrease. The more they touch you, the more your life will decrease.Scores are saved after finishing each game. Thanks toÂ ScoreloopÂ you can compete withÂ people around theÂ world. Just take from the main menu, press in the WORLD RANKINGS. Each device is assigned a unique profile, you can change your name, email and photo. You can also add friends, watch their games, recommend your games â¦From the time to time some rays will appear. They will be waiting for you to toast your finger. Avoid it in any possible way! Firstly, the area where they are about to turn up will be pointed out, then they will try to burn your finger. Tanned flesh... These Zombies love it! These rays can make your life bar disappear, but you will not be killed.Hearts will often pop up. You should pay attention, they will remain only for a few seconds. Every heart you get will increase your life bar by 20 points. Run! Run!Press Menu and Back buttons on your device during the game in order to pause the chase.The game language is automatically selected. Depending on the language you have active on your device. Available in English and Spanish.ENJOY!*The Internet permits are for the banner. Call permissions: they are to assign a unique ID or profile to each phone for the world ranking. NEVER get personal data.*Made with Andengine (www.andengine.org) & Scoreloop-If you like the game you can invite me to a coffee from my web site  http://ftbdroid.blogspot.com  Thanks! :)
